meanings.definition: A prestigious award given annually for excellence in the film industry.
meanings.sent1: Winning an Oscars can be a dream come true for actors and filmmakers.
meanings.sent2: Many talented artists hope to receive an Oscars in their career.
meanings.sent3: The Oscars ceremony is like a glamorous party for the movie world.
meanings.sent4: Her performance was so outstanding, it deserved an Oscars.
meanings.sent5: The Oscars symbolize the highest achievement in the film industry.

meanings.definition: The name of a person, typically a male, of Irish origin.
meanings.sent1: My friend's name is Oscars, and he is from Ireland.
meanings.sent2: Oscars is a common name among Irish families.
meanings.sent3: When Oscars walks into a room, you can feel his Irish charm.
meanings.sent4: He is as proud of his Irish heritage as his name Oscars.
meanings.sent5: Oscars always celebrates St. Patrick's Day with enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: A type of fish commonly found in tropical waters.
meanings.sent1: The Oscars fish has vibrant colors that stand out in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Divers enjoy spotting Oscars while exploring tropical reefs.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Oscars fish refuse to share its seaweed? Because it was a little shellfish!
meanings.sent4: The Oscars fish moved gracefully through the water, like a dancer in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the Oscars fish caught the sunlight beautifully.
